name: Spaceoid
description:
You are a Space-miner and your goal is survival and ore mining in the asteroid fields of a distant galaxy.

(Because I wanted it to be playable by my young nephews, Spaceoid is a no-kill shooter.)

Controls

Move   ⬅️➡️ ⬆️⬇️

Shoot  ❎  (5 bullets max in a raw untill you get the "constant fire" bonus)

Speed Boost 🅾️ (can help to quickly get out of trouble or reach a bonus)

Things to know

  • Shooting small Asteroids you have a chance to get some Gold ore or some Bonuses ! Those Asteroïds might contain some Diamonds Those big Rocks are indestructible
     just avoid them.
  • If you stick to the top and bottom edges of the screen, the chances of getting ore and bonuses will be reduced.
  • Your cannon can be upgraded with this bonus

    you will shoot more bullets at a time (max 3)
    This Bonus gives you "permanent fire"
    (At the beginning you can only fire bursts of 5 bullets)
    Plasma Gun(destroys small asteroïds with one shoot)
    Magnet Bonus
    (You attract every loots)
    Gravity Blast
    (Every asteroïds are pushed away)
    Extra life 5 Repair points
    10 Repair points
    15 Repair points
    20 Repair points
  • This game is still in development, any comment is welcome to improve it
